commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Let us use this!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What's that? A chair?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: A special ice skating chair. I rented two of them. You, Mari, Rin, can you come over here for a moment?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: What's up?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Well... *Whisper* *Whisper*

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Uh-huh. That's a great idea, Setsu!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Sounds like fun!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What are you all whispering about without us?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I hope it's not another wacky idea.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You can look forward to seeing if it's wacky or not when you give it a shot! Maki! Kasumi! Sit on the chairs. Go on!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: S-Slow down. All right, I get it. You don't need to drag me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, ack! Come on! What's the big idea?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Right then, everyone! Please stand behind the ice skating chairs. Maki and Kasumi, please hold on tight. Here we go! Ready, and...

commands.speaker: Setsuna, You, Mari, Rin
commands.line: Push!

commands.speaker: Kasumi, Maki
commands.line: Kasumi: Eeeeeek! Maki: Wha?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: The first team to push their chair a whole lap around the rink wins!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It'd be nice if you said something sooner! Whoa! Th-This is really fast! You're going too fast!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We won't win unless we go fast!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Ugh! I don't get it! I don't get it...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: But maybe this isn't so bad...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Did you say something just now, Maki?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Nothing! Come on! If you don't push hard enough they'll overtake us!

commands.speaker: Setsuna, You, Mari, Rin
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* *Huff*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The chair race was pretty fun!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Who won?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: N-No...clue...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: W-We got carried away and ended up skating a few laps around...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, yeah? You don't know, huh? Then the race is extended! Let's do another lap!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're right. We really should decide on a winning team now that we've come this far.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: What!? H-Hang on, we need a break!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I suppose you do deserve a little rest. We'll start up again in five minutes.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna ride on the chair too, Maki! Let's switch places for the next race.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Nope. Kasumi and I are the main racers for this, right? So I have to be the one who rides on the chair until the race is over. Right, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: R-Right... Take a good five-minute break, everyone! We will decide on a winning team with the next race!

commands.speaker: You, Mari, Rin
commands.line: You, Mari: Right... Rin: Right!
